commit.message:
(trap): New attribute.

Modify patterns for all floating-point trap generating instructions.

From-SVN: r11551

files.patch:
@@ -30,6 +30,11 @@
   "ld,st,ibr,fbr,jsr,iaddlog,shiftcm,icmp,imull,imulq,fpop,fdivs,fdivt,ldsym,isubr"
   (const_string "shiftcm"))
 
+;; The TRAP_TYPE attribute marks instructions that may generate traps
+;; (which are imprecise and may need a trapb if software complention
+;; is desired).
+(define_attr "trap" "yes,no" (const_string "no"))
+
 ;; We include four function units: ABOX, which computes the address,
 ;; BBOX, used for branches, EBOX, used for integer operations, and FBOX,
 ;; used for FP operations.
@@ -1175,30 +1180,72 @@
   "cpysn %R1,%R1,%0"
   [(set_attr "type" "fpop")])
 
+(define_insn ""
+  [(set (match_operand:SF 0 "register_operand" "=&f")
+	(plus:SF (match_operand:SF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "%fG")
+		 (match_operand:SF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
+  "TARGET_FP && (alpha_tp == ALPHA_TP_INSN)"
+  "adds%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
+
 (define_insn "addsf3"
   [(set (match_operand:SF 0 "register_operand" "=f")
 	(plus:SF (match_operand:SF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "%fG")
 		 (match_operand:SF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
   "TARGET_FP"
-  "adds %R1,%R2,%0"
-  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")])
+  "adds%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
+
+(define_insn ""
+  [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=&f")
+	(plus:DF (match_operand:DF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "%fG")
+		 (match_operand:DF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
+  "TARGET_FP && (alpha_tp == ALPHA_TP_INSN)"
+  "addt%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
 
 (define_insn "adddf3"
   [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=f")
 	(plus:DF (match_operand:DF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "%fG")
 		 (match_operand:DF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
   "TARGET_FP"
-  "addt %R1,%R2,%0"
-  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")])
+  "addt%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
+
+(define_insn ""
+  [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=&f")
+	(plus:DF (float_extend:DF
+		  (match_operand:SF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG"))
+		 (match_operand:DF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
+  "TARGET_FP && (alpha_tp == ALPHA_TP_INSN)"
+  "addt%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
 
 (define_insn ""
   [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=f")
 	(plus:DF (float_extend:DF
 		  (match_operand:SF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG"))
 		 (match_operand:DF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
   "TARGET_FP"
-  "addt %R1,%R2,%0"
-  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")])
+  "addt%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
+
+(define_insn ""
+  [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=&f")
+	(plus:DF (float_extend:DF
+		  (match_operand:SF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "%fG"))
+		 (float_extend:DF
+		  (match_operand:SF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG"))))]
+  "TARGET_FP && (alpha_tp == ALPHA_TP_INSN)"
+  "addt%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
 
 (define_insn ""
   [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=f")
@@ -1207,8 +1254,9 @@
 		 (float_extend:DF
 		  (match_operand:SF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG"))))]
   "TARGET_FP"
-  "addt %R1,%R2,%0"
-  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")])
+  "addt%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
 
 (define_insn "fix_truncdfdi2"
   [(set (match_operand:DI 0 "register_operand" "=f")
@@ -1225,101 +1273,232 @@
   "cvttqc %R1,%0"
   [(set_attr "type" "fpop")])
 
+(define_insn ""
+  [(set (match_operand:SF 0 "register_operand" "=&f")
+	(float:SF (match_operand:DI 1 "register_operand" "f")))]
+  "TARGET_FP && (alpha_tp == ALPHA_TP_INSN)"
+  "cvtqs%+%& %1,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
+
 (define_insn "floatdisf2"
   [(set (match_operand:SF 0 "register_operand" "=f")
 	(float:SF (match_operand:DI 1 "register_operand" "f")))]
   "TARGET_FP"
-  "cvtqs %1,%0"
-  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")])
+  "cvtqs%+%& %1,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
+
+(define_insn ""
+  [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=&f")
+	(float:DF (match_operand:DI 1 "register_operand" "f")))]
+  "TARGET_FP && (alpha_tp == ALPHA_TP_INSN)"
+  "cvtqt%+%& %1,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
 
 (define_insn "floatdidf2"
   [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=f")
 	(float:DF (match_operand:DI 1 "register_operand" "f")))]
   "TARGET_FP"
-  "cvtqt %1,%0"
-  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")])
+  "cvtqt%+%& %1,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
+
+(define_insn ""
+  [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=&f,f")
+	(float_extend:DF (match_operand:SF 1 "nonimmediate_operand" "f,m")))]
+  "TARGET_FP && (alpha_tp == ALPHA_TP_INSN)"
+  "@
+   addt%)%& $f31,%1,%0
+   lds %0,%1"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop,ld")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
 
 (define_insn "extendsfdf2"
   [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=f,f")
 	(float_extend:DF (match_operand:SF 1 "nonimmediate_operand" "f,m")))]
   "TARGET_FP"
   "@
-   addt $f31,%1,%0
+   addt%)%& $f31,%1,%0
    lds %0,%1"
-  [(set_attr "type" "fpop,ld")])
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop,ld")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
+
+(define_insn ""
+  [(set (match_operand:SF 0 "register_operand" "=&f")
+	(float_truncate:SF (match_operand:DF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
+  "TARGET_FP && (alpha_tp == ALPHA_TP_INSN)"
+  "cvtts%)%& %R1,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
 
 (define_insn "truncdfsf2"
   [(set (match_operand:SF 0 "register_operand" "=f")
 	(float_truncate:SF (match_operand:DF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
   "TARGET_FP"
-  "cvtts %R1,%0"
-  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")])
+  "cvtts%)%& %R1,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
+
+(define_insn ""
+  [(set (match_operand:SF 0 "register_operand" "=&f")
+	(div:SF (match_operand:SF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")
+		(match_operand:SF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
+  "TARGET_FP && (alpha_tp == ALPHA_TP_INSN)"
+  "divs%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fdivs")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
 
 (define_insn "divsf3"
   [(set (match_operand:SF 0 "register_operand" "=f")
 	(div:SF (match_operand:SF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")
 		(match_operand:SF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
   "TARGET_FP"
-  "divs %R1,%R2,%0"
-  [(set_attr "type" "fdivs")])
+  "divs%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fdivs")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
+
+(define_insn ""
+  [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=&f")
+	(div:DF (match_operand:DF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")
+		(match_operand:DF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
+  "TARGET_FP && (alpha_tp == ALPHA_TP_INSN)"
+  "divt%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fdivt")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
 
 (define_insn "divdf3"
   [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=f")
 	(div:DF (match_operand:DF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")
 		(match_operand:DF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
   "TARGET_FP"
-  "divt %R1,%R2,%0"
-  [(set_attr "type" "fdivt")])
+  "divt%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fdivt")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
+
+(define_insn ""
+  [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=&f")
+	(div:DF (float_extend:DF (match_operand:SF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG"))
+		(match_operand:DF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
+  "TARGET_FP && (alpha_tp == ALPHA_TP_INSN)"
+  "divt%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fdivt")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
 
 (define_insn ""
   [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=f")
 	(div:DF (float_extend:DF (match_operand:SF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG"))
 		(match_operand:DF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
   "TARGET_FP"
-  "divt %R1,%R2,%0"
-  [(set_attr "type" "fdivt")])
+  "divt%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fdivt")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])

+	(div:DF (match_operand:DF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")
+		(float_extend:DF
+		 (match_operand:SF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG"))))]
+  "TARGET_FP && (alpha_tp == ALPHA_TP_INSN)"
+  "divt%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fdivt")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
 
 (define_insn ""
   [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=f")
 	(div:DF (match_operand:DF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")
 		(float_extend:DF
 		 (match_operand:SF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG"))))]
   "TARGET_FP"
-  "divt %R1,%R2,%0"
-  [(set_attr "type" "fdivt")])
+  "divt%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fdivt")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])

+  [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=&f")
+	(div:DF (float_extend:DF (match_operand:SF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG"))
+		(float_extend:DF (match_operand:SF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG"))))]
+  "TARGET_FP && (alpha_tp == ALPHA_TP_INSN)"
+  "divt%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fdivt")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
 
 (define_insn ""
   [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=f")
 	(div:DF (float_extend:DF (match_operand:SF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG"))
 		(float_extend:DF (match_operand:SF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG"))))]
   "TARGET_FP"
-  "divt %R1,%R2,%0"
-  [(set_attr "type" "fdivt")])
+  "divt%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fdivt")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])

+(define_insn ""
+  [(set (match_operand:SF 0 "register_operand" "=&f")
+	(mult:SF (match_operand:SF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "%fG")
+		 (match_operand:SF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
+  "TARGET_FP && (alpha_tp == ALPHA_TP_INSN)"
+  "muls%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
 
 (define_insn "mulsf3"
   [(set (match_operand:SF 0 "register_operand" "=f")
 	(mult:SF (match_operand:SF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "%fG")
 		 (match_operand:SF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
   "TARGET_FP"
-  "muls %R1,%R2,%0"
-  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")])
+  "muls%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
+
+(define_insn ""
+  [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=&f")

+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])

   [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=f")
 	(mult:DF (match_operand:DF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "%fG")
 		 (match_operand:DF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
   "TARGET_FP"
-  "mult %R1,%R2,%0"
-  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")])
+  "mult%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
+
+(define_insn ""
+  [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=&f")
+	(mult:DF (float_extend:DF
+		  (match_operand:SF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG"))
+		 (match_operand:DF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
+  "TARGET_FP && (alpha_tp == ALPHA_TP_INSN)"
+  "mult%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])

   [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=f")
 	(mult:DF (float_extend:DF
 		  (match_operand:SF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG"))
 		 (match_operand:DF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
   "TARGET_FP"
-  "mult %R1,%R2,%0"
-  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")])
+  "mult%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
+
+(define_insn ""
+  [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=&f")
+	(mult:DF (float_extend:DF
+		  (match_operand:SF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "%fG"))
+		 (float_extend:DF
+		  (match_operand:SF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG"))))]
+  "TARGET_FP && (alpha_tp == ALPHA_TP_INSN)"
+  "mult%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
 
 (define_insn ""
   [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=f")
@@ -1328,42 +1507,96 @@
 		 (float_extend:DF
 		  (match_operand:SF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG"))))]
   "TARGET_FP"
-  "mult %R1,%R2,%0"
-  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")])
+  "mult%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
+
+(define_insn ""
+  [(set (match_operand:SF 0 "register_operand" "=&f")
+	(minus:SF (match_operand:SF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")
+		  (match_operand:SF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
+  "TARGET_FP && (alpha_tp == ALPHA_TP_INSN)"
+  "subs%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")

+  "subt%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"

 	(minus:DF (match_operand:DF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")
 		  (match_operand:DF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]

-  "subt %R1,%R2,%0"
-  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")])

+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])

+	(minus:DF (float_extend:DF
+		   (match_operand:SF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG"))
+		  (match_operand:DF 2 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG")))]
+  "TARGET_FP && (alpha_tp == ALPHA_TP_INSN)"
+  "subt%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
 
 (define_insn ""
   [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=f")
 	(minus:DF (float_extend:DF
 		   (match_operand:SF 1 "reg_or_fp0_operand" "fG"))

-  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")])

+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")

@@ -1372,8 +1605,9 @@

   "TARGET_FP"
-  "subt %R1,%R2,%0"
-  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")])
+  "subt%)%& %R1,%R2,%0"
+  [(set_attr "type" "fpop")
+   (set_attr "trap" "yes")])
  
 ;; Next are all the integer comparisons, and conditional moves and branches
 ;; and some of the related define_expand's and define_split's.
@@ -1782,14 +2016,36 @@
 ;; we need to have variants that expand the arguments from SF mode
 ;; to DFmode.
 
+(define_insn ""
+  [(set (match_operand:DF 0 "register_operand" "=&f")
